TextView.android:text:
Plant-Hunt is an exploration game where each player or team has to collect as many points as possible from taking pictures of a maximum of rare plants.
 The plants are identified directly in the app using a wifi connection or you can store the pictures and get the results as soon as you get back online.
 The game can be played with any number of player from 1 to 100 years old.
 Good luck hunting!
